lead_paragraph: The Huntsville (Ala.) Advocate publishes the following extract of a private letter from Gen. CASS to Senator CLEMENS of that State: "And there is a better feeling at the North, and though fanaticism will talk and write, still there is just as little probability of our interforing with your slaves, as there is of your interforing with our honses and lands."
abstract: Letter to Gen Clemens on Disunion (ed)
